title: Create New Zealand immigration e-visa status checking website

requirements.text: Create a backend actor that stores and retrieves visa application records with fields: application reference number, passport number, date of birth, application status (Received, In Progress, Approved, Declined), application type, submission date, and last updated date

quotes: make new zealand immigration e-visa check website
check their visa application status by entering application details

acceptanceCriteria: Backend can store visa application records with all required fields
Backend provides a query function that accepts application reference, passport number, and date of birth
Backend returns matching application status or appropriate error message

requirements.text: Build a visa status check form with input fields for application reference number, passport number, and date of birth with proper validation

quotes: check their visa application status by entering application details

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes labeled input fields for application reference number, passport number, and date of birth
All fields are validated before submission
Form displays validation errors for invalid or missing inputs

requirements.text: Display visa application status results showing application reference, current status, application type, submission date, and last updated date in a clear, organized layout
acceptanceCriteria: Status results display all relevant application information
Current status is prominently displayed with appropriate visual indicators
Layout clearly organizes information for easy reading
Appropriate messaging shown when no application is found

requirements.text: Create a professional, government-style interface inspired by official immigration portals with clean typography, formal color scheme, and clear information hierarchy that conveys trustworthiness and official authenticity

quotes: similar to the official Immigration New Zealand portal

acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses professional government-style aesthetics with formal colors
Typography is clear and accessible with proper hierarchy
Layout conveys official trustworthiness and credibility
Interface follows conventions of government service portals

requirements.text: Add backend function to seed sample visa applications for demonstration purposes including various statuses (Received, In Progress, Approved, Declined)
acceptanceCriteria: Backend includes function to initialize sample visa applications
Sample data covers all possible application statuses
Sample applications have realistic reference numbers and dates

constraints: Use Motoko for backend implementation in single-actor architecture
Use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for frontend
Do not integrate with actual New Zealand Immigration APIs or external services
Do not implement real authentication beyond Internet Identity if needed
nonGoals: Integration with actual Immigration New Zealand systems
Real passport verification or government database connections

required: New Zealand flag icon or national emblem suitable for government portal header (nz-emblem.dim_120x120.png)
Clean professional hero background with subtle patterns suggesting official government documentation (hero-bg.dim_1920x400.png)
